description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application, handling server-side rendering, request processing, and setting CORS headers. It manages different request types (bot vs browser) and streams responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main export that handles incoming HTTP requests, sets CORS headers, and delegates to either bot or browser handling functions.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot user agents, streams the rendered content.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser user agents, streams the rendered content.
